channel.title: Apachie Ant Problem
channel.description:
What do I do with this Apachie Ant thing. When I try to run it says:
'ant' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Am I supposed to but a certain item in a certain folder or something?

item.title: Apachie Ant Problem
item.dc:creator: @Micky_Mouse Micky Mouse
item.description:
@Micky_Mouse wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:2, topic:217138”]do these steps:

  1. Right click computer > properties
  2. Goto advanced tab or if your in vista click “advanced system settings”
  3. Click Environmental Variablitities
  4. Now for User vairables make a new one called “PATH”
  5. Value is your apachies bin folder. MIne is “C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin”
  6. Ok > OK and run now, it should work.[/quote]

+1 that

Read full topic

item.title: Apachie Ant Problem
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

do these steps:

  1. Right click computer > properties
  2. Goto advanced tab or if your in vista click “advanced system settings”
  3. Click Environmental Variablitities
  4. Now for User vairables make a new one called “PATH”
  5. Value is your apachies bin folder. MIne is “C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin”
  6. Ok > OK and run now, it should work.

Read full topic
